headline: ALEXANDERWERK ROTOR FINE GRANULATOR UP TO 400 KG HOUR
description: Rotor Fine Granulator   Throughput up to 400 Kg per hour    With SKM/NR gear motor drive.
categories.lvl1: Other Equipment > Other Items and Mixed Lots
specstable:
Manufacturer Alexanderwerk
Model RFG 150 DA
Description Rotor Fine Granulator with Universal Gear Motor Drive
Year of Manufacture 2010
Power Requirements 460 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Accessories

SKM/NR Attachable Geared Motor Drive

  • Three phase AC geared motor with frequency drive
  • 1.5kW
  • 460V, 3phase, 60 Hz
  • IP 54 protection rating
  • 30-140 rpm
  • Dimensiions HXWXD: 370mm, 313mm, 625mm, 52kg
Other Information

RFG 150 DA Technical Data

  • Continuous throughput operation: up to 400 kg/hour
  • Rotor diameter: 150mm
  • Working length: approx. 200mm
  • Mesh size: 0.63 - 3.15mm
  • Weight: approk 90 kg
Weight 350 lb (159 kg)
